review_text: I ordered a smartphone, but received a smartwatch instead. This is unacceptable. Please fix this or I will return the item.
I'm having trouble accessing my account. I've tried resetting my password multiple times, but I'm not receiving any emails.
suggested_action: Verify the customer's email address and check the spam or junk folder for the password reset emails. If not found, escalate the issue to the technical team for further investigation.

review_text: The laptop I received has a defective screen. It keeps flickering, and I can't use it for work. I need a replacement.
suggested_action: Initiate a replacement process for the defective laptop.

review_text: I ordered a new camera, but the lens was missing from the package. I need the lens urgently for an event this weekend.
I can't find the option to update my payment details on your website. Can someone guide me through the process?
suggested_action: Provide step-by-step instructions on how to update payment details on the website.

review_text: The headphones I bought last month stopped working. They won't charge and are completely unresponsive. Can I get a refund?
My order was supposed to arrive last week, but it's still showing as 'in transit'. Can you check on this for me?
suggested_action: Check the tracking details for the order and investigate the delay.

review_text: I received the wrong color of the shoes I ordered. I wanted black, but received blue. How can I exchange them?
The software license key I received is not working. It says the key has already been used. Please help me with this issue.
suggested_action: Verify the software license key provided and issue a new one if necessary.

review_text: I've been overcharged for my recent purchase. The invoice shows a higher amount than what I was told. Can you correct this?
The washing machine I bought is making a strange noise. It wasn't like this when I first got it. What should I do?
I accidentally ordered two of the same item. Can you cancel one of them before it ships?
The blender I received is missing some parts. I can't use it without the blades. Can you send the missing parts?
suggested_action: Verify the missing parts with the customer's order details and initiate the shipment of the missing blades.

review_text: My package was delivered to the wrong address. I need help recovering it.
I ordered a gift for my friend, but it arrived damaged. How can I get a replacement quickly?
I can't apply the discount code you sent me. It says it's invalid. Can you help?
suggested_action: Verify the discount code and ensure it is correctly entered in the system. If the issue persists, check if the code has expired or if there are any usage restrictions.

review_text: The tablet I bought is overheating during use. Is this normal, or should I return it?
I tried to contact customer service, but no one is responding. Can someone please get back to me?
suggested_action: Assign the ticket to a customer service representative for a follow-up response.

review_text: My credit card was charged twice for the same order. I need a refund for the duplicate charge.
I received the wrong size for the clothes I ordered. Can I exchange them for the correct size?
The app crashes every time I try to place an order. Can you fix this bug?
suggested_action: Investigate the app crashing issue when placing an order

review_text: I need to change the shipping address for my order, but the website won't let me. Can someone assist?
suggested_action: Review the order details, attempt to manually update the shipping address in the system, and notify the customer once the address has been successfully changed.

review_text: The gaming console I ordered arrived without any controllers. I can't use it without them. Please send the missing items.
I ordered a laptop, but the box was empty when it arrived. This is completely unacceptable!
The coffee maker I bought isn't brewing correctly. It only makes half a cup each time. What can I do?
The customer support number on your website is incorrect. I can't reach anyone. Can you provide the correct number?
suggested_action: Update the customer support number on the website to ensure customers can reach the support team efficiently.

review_text: I purchased a digital download, but I never received the download link. Can you send it to me?

My order was marked as delivered, but I never received it. Can you check what happened?
key_information: ['Order marked as delivered but not received']
suggested_action: Check delivery status and investigate the issue with the shipping carrier. Offer to initiate a refund or resend the order if necessary.

suggested_action: Investigate and resolve the online chat support issue to assist the customer with their order.

review_text: The printer I bought has constant paper jams. It's very frustrating. What can I do?
